General information of the service provider (§ 5 TMG):
University of Cologne\nSprachliche Informationsverarbeitung\nInstitut für Institute of Linguistics
Responsible for the editorial content (§ 55 parag. 2 RStV):
This mobile app is not actively extracting and saving any personal data from your smartphone.

Software Engineering: 
Marco Zeyen

Java-Programming: 
Betül Büsra

XML-Layouting and Bugtesting: 
Tobias Weber

Project Management and legalities: 
Jürgen Schmitz

iOS Version: 
Christian Theisen

Please be advised though, that our navigation function allows you to open the Google Maps app of your device to help you navigate to the seminar buildings. The Google Maps app itself is saving several kinds of personal data for its navigation functions. Please consult the Google Privacy Policy for further information on the use of personal data of your Google Maps app: https://www.google.de/intl/en_de/policies/privacy/. \n\nPlease be aware, that this mobile app has no influence on the data usage of other mobile apps like Google Maps.
Additional Information for the sharing function

Please be aware, that this mobile app includes a sharing function to share events via social media. If you share any event, the service of the selected social media service is called. Please be aware that many social media services track personal data from your smartphone. We advise you to consult the privacy policy of the social media service you want to select before using our sharing function.
Additional Information for the calendar function

This mobile app allows you to mark events of your choosing directly on the calendar-app of your smartphone by clicking on the calendar button on the event overview. This mobile app is only transferring the event information to your calendar app, so that it is easier to mark the date. After you clicked the calendar button you get the opportunity to confirm the new calendar date. The dates of your calendar app are not changed without you accessing your calendar app and confirming the date.
